resources.string: The beat track shows you when to tap the screen. Tap when the beat is in the middle of the double horizontal lines.
Tap on the battlefield (not on the beat track) to create a unit at that spot.
When there is a long, "hold" beat, drag your finger across the field to create a wall.
Your base is at the bottom. Your opponent\'s base is at the top. Destroy your opponent\'s base by creating units to attack it.
You win when your opponent\'s health reaches 0, or if the song ends and your health is higher.
